content.text:
# 1977 Country Music Association Awards

The 1977 Country Music Association Awards, 11th Ceremony, was held on October 10, 1977, at the Grand Ole Opry House, Nashville, Tennessee, and was hosted by CMA Award winner Johnny Cash.
Winners and nominees
Winners in Bold.
{| class="wikitable"
! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Entertainer of the Year
! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Album of the Year
|-
| valign="top" |
* Ronnie Milsap
** Merle Haggard
** Waylon Jennings
** Dolly Parton
** Kenny Rogers
| valign="top" |
* 'Ronnie Milsap Live — Ronnie Milsap'
** ''I Don't Want to Have to Marry You — Jim Ed Brown and Helen Cornelius
** I Remember Patsy — Loretta Lynn
** Kenny Rogers — Kenny Rogers
** Ol' Waylon'' — Waylon Jennings
|-
